about_us: We are Davi Miguel and Antônio Victor, graduates and undergraduates in Computer Science from the State University of Paraíba. We create functional and responsive websites, focused on meeting the needs of companies and professionals looking to stand out in the digital environment.
info_site_moviemetricks: Website to collect information about movies and series, with details about cast, synopsis, direction, and reviews, making it easier to find your favorite productions.
info_site_academia: Website for a fictional gym with details about services, available plans, schedules, and contact information, making it easier for customers to access.
internship_davi: Currently in a software development internship
internship_victor: Currently in an internship at Compass UOL focused on blockchain
